title: Web Application Foundation
description:
Build the frontend foundation for vibe-engineering: React SPA with Vite, TanStack Router, Tailwind v4, shadcn/ui. Deploy to Cloudflare Workers via GitHub Actions. Protect with Cloudflare Access (email OTP).

## Goals
- Establish development environment with fast iteration (sub-second HMR)
- Implement type-safe routing with TanStack Router
- Apply Mira design system (Stone/Emerald, JetBrains Mono, sharp corners)
- Automate deployments via GitHub Actions
- Protect with Cloudflare Access authentication

## Success Criteria
- pnpm dev starts in < 2 seconds
- pnpm build completes in < 30 seconds
- Automated deployment on push to main
- Application protected by auth

## Technology Stack
- Vite + React 18 + TypeScript
- TanStack Router (file-based)
- Tailwind CSS v4 + shadcn/ui
- Cloudflare Workers with Static Assets
- GitHub Actions CI/CD
- Cloudflare Access (email OTP)

## Design Reference
See STYLE_GUIDE.md for Mira design system details.

title: Initialize Vite + React TypeScript project
description:
Create web/ directory with Vite + React + TypeScript foundation.

## Context
This is the root task - all other tasks depend on it.

## Implementation
1. pnpm create vite@latest web --template react-ts
2. cd web && pnpm install
3. Verify: pnpm dev
4. Verify: pnpm build
5. Clean boilerplate

## Acceptance
- web/ directory exists
- pnpm dev starts at localhost:5173
- pnpm build creates dist/
- Boilerplate removed

title: Configure TanStack Router with file-based routing
description:
Install TanStack Router with Vite plugin for file-based route generation.

## Implementation
1. pnpm add @tanstack/react-router
2. pnpm add -D @tanstack/router-plugin @tanstack/router-devtools
3. Configure Vite plugin
4. Create src/routes/__root.tsx and index.tsx
5. Update main.tsx with RouterProvider

## Acceptance
- Router packages installed
- routeTree.gen.ts auto-generated
- Routes work with TypeScript safety

title: Set up Tailwind CSS v4 with style guide integration
description: Install Tailwind v4 and configure with STYLE_GUIDE.md Mira design system (Stone base, Emerald accent, JetBrains Mono, no radius).

title: Configure shadcn/ui with Mira style
description: Initialize shadcn/ui, configure path aliases, add button component, customize for Mira style.

title: Create root layout and home page
description: Build __root.tsx layout and index.tsx home page demonstrating complete stack integration.

title: Configure Cloudflare Worker for static assets
description: Create wrangler.toml and src/worker.ts for serving SPA via Workers with Static Assets (not Pages per CLAUDE.md).

title: Create GitHub Actions deployment workflow
description: Create .github/workflows/deploy-web.yml for automated deployment to Cloudflare Workers on push to main.

title: Document Cloudflare Access configuration
description: Create web/docs/cloudflare-access-setup.md with step-by-step guide for email OTP authentication setup.
